name: .SK2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .SK2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Compact vector-based drawing created with ChemSketch, a advanced chemical drawing program; contains molecular structures and related information.

content: The SK2 ACD/ChemSketch file format is a proprietary format developed by ACD/Labs. However, it is publicly available, meaning it can be used as an import or output format in other programs.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
